apps.name: standalone-map
apps.description: A collection of visualizations designed to support the unbiased exploration of relationships between spatiotemporal variables in a cartographic map

visualizations.name: histogram
visualizations.description: Visualize the distribution of a continuous variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date and be the same or a child entity as the variable the map markers are painted with, if any.

visualizations.name: barplot
visualizations.description: Visualize the distribution of a categorical variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a child entity as the variable the map markers are painted with, if any.

visualizations.name: scatterplot
visualizations.description: Visualize the relationship between two continuous variables

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date and be the same or a child entity as the variable the map markers are painted with, if any.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date and be of the same or a child entity as the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: boxplot
visualizations.description: Visualize summary values for a continuous variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 10 or fewer unique values and be the same or a child entity as the variable the map markers are painted with, if any.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number and be of the same or a child entity as the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: conttable
visualizations.description: Visualize the frequency distribution and associated statistics for two categorical variables

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 10 or fewer unique values and be from the same branch of the dataset diagram as the Y-axis variable.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 10 or fewer unique values and be from the same branch of the dataset diagram as the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: lineplot
visualizations.description: Visualize aggregate values of one variable across the sequential values of an ordered variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be ordinal, a number, or a date and be the same or a child entity as the variable the map markers are painted with, if any.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must be of the same or a child entity as the X-axis variable.

apps.name: pass
apps.description: A collection of visualizations designed to support the unbiased exploration of relationships between variables

visualizations.name: histogram
visualizations.description: Visualize the distribution of a continuous variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: barplot
visualizations.description: Visualize the distribution of a categorical variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 10 or fewer unique values.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity of the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: scatterplot
visualizations.description: Visualize the relationship between two continuous variables

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date and be of the same or a parent entity as the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must be a number, or have 8 or fewer values, and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must be a number, or have 8 or fewer values, and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date.

visualizations.name: boxplot
visualizations.description: Visualize summary values for a continuous variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 10 or fewer unique values and be the same or a parent entity of the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity of the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values and be the same or a parent entity of the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: twobytwo
visualizations.description: Visualize the frequency distribution and associated statistics for two dichotomous variables

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have exactly 2 unique values and be from the same branch of the dataset diagram as the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the axes variables.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must have exactly 2 unique values and be from the same branch of the dataset diagram as the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: conttable
visualizations.description: Visualize the frequency distribution and chi-squared test results for two categorical variables

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 10 or fewer unique values and be from the same branch of the dataset diagram as the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity of the X-axis variable.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values and be from the same branch of the dataset diagram as the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: lineplot
visualizations.description: Visualize aggregate values of one variable across the sequential values of an ordered variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be ordinal, a number, or a date and be of the same or a parent entity of the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: densityplot
visualizations.description: Visualize the smoothed distribution (using a kernel density estimate) of a continuous variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity of the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity of the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: heatmap
visualizations.description: Visualize the magnitude of a continuous numeric variable

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 1000 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.

yAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 1000 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the Z-axis variable.

visualizations.name: map-markers
visualizations.description: Visualize available variables on a geographic map.

visualizations.name: map-markers-overlay
visualizations.description: Visualize counts and proportions of both categorical and continuous data overlaid on map markers.

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values.

geoAggregateVariable.description: Variable(s) must be of the same or a parent entity of the main variable.

apps.name: alphadiv
apps.description: Visualize within-sample (alpha) microbial diversity based on field-standard metrics, such as the Shannon Diversity Index, Simpson's Diversity Index, and Pielou's Evenness.

visualizations.name: boxplot
visualizations.description: Visualize alpha diversity summary values

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must have 10 or fewer unique values and be the same or a parent entity of the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 7 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity of the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values and be the same or a parent entity of the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: scatterplot
visualizations.description: Visualize the relationship between a continuous variable and alpha diversity

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date and be of the same or a parent entity as the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must be a number, or have 8 or fewer values, and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date and be of the same or a parent entity as the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 10 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must be a number, or have 8 or fewer values, and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.

apps.name: abundance
apps.description: Plot the top n taxa, pathways, or genes from any study, ranked by either the median, maximum, variance, or third quartile of the relative abundance values.

visualizations.name: boxplot
visualizations.description: Visualize ranked abundance summary values

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have 7 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity of the Overlay variable.

overlayVariable.description: Variable must have 8 or fewer unique values and be the same or a parent entity of the X-axis variable.

visualizations.name: scatterplot
visualizations.description: Visualize the relationship between a continuous variable and abundance

xAxisVariable.description: Variable must be a number or date and be of the same or a parent entity as the Y-axis variable.

facetVariable.description: Variable(s) must have7 or fewer unique values and be of the same or a parent entity as the Overlay variable.

apps.name: betadiv
apps.description: Visualize between-sample (beta) comparisons in microbial diversity, using Bray-Curtis dissimilarity, Jensen-Shannon Divergence, or the Jaccard Index

visualizations.name: scatterplot
visualizations.description: Visualize a 2-dimensional projection of samples based on their beta diversitiy

overlayVariable.description: Variable must be a number, or have 8 or fewer values, and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.
Variable must be a number, or have 8 or fewer values, and be of the same or a parent entity as the X-axis variable.
